thought: To craft prismarine_brick_stairs, I need to place 6 prismarine_bricks in a stair-like pattern in the crafting grid. I have 6 prismarine_bricks in slot 35, so I will move them to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1
